snippet: “Roman Polanski: Odd Man Out,” a 2012 documentary about Mr. Polanski’s effort to avoid extradition to the United States to face a sexual assault charge, will have its debut on Showtime on Sept. 27.
abstract: Roman Polanski lends his voice to 2012 documentary Roman Polanski: Odd Man Out, which will have its television debut on Showtime, about his effort to avoid extradition to United States to face sexual assault charge; Polanski's voice, reading open letter he penned in 2010, was not in film when it was screened at Toronto International Film Festival.
lead_paragraph: “Roman Polanski: Odd Man Out,” a 2012 documentary about Mr. Polanski’s effort to avoid extradition to the United States to face a sexual assault charge, will have its debut on Showtime on Sept. 27.

headline.main: Roman Polanski Lends Voice to Documentary About Him
